description: The graph depicts the frequency of headlines mention in relevant Russian-language media. It uses regex expressions for requesting the words "Nazis" and “Azovstal” in the Tableau worksheet. Timeframe: 01.01.2022 - 31.07.2022. Data source: GDELT.
chart_title: Frequency mention of headlines related to “Nazis in Azovstal steel plant” subject in Russian media.
name: nazi-tableau-azov
